entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
